short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add colored circles next to names on awakens.me. Red for idle users and green for active users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wonder just who on awakens is idle and who is active?
Does the weird menu layout confuse you?

Well wonder no more! With this extension installed, a circle representing a user's idle status will appear next to their name. Green for active and red for idle/AFK.
